title: A discovery of certain notorious stumbling-blocks which the devill, the pope, and the malignants have raised to put nations at variance: together, with some zealous wishes, that such stumbling-blocks as prove prejudiciall unto the common-wealth of England might be removed. / By Sr. Balthazar Gerbier Kt.
author: Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.
